name: weather-api
description: Weather data retrieval via Open-Meteo API. Supports current weather, forecasts, hourly data, historical data, and location search. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: weather_api
toolDefinition.description: Retrieve weather data via Open-Meteo API. Get current conditions, forecasts, hourly data, historical weather, and search locations. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: get_current (current weather for a location), get_forecast (daily forecast up to 16 days), get_hourly (hourly forecast up to 168 hours), get_historical (historical weather data), search_location (search for a location by name), list_variables (list available weather variables)

lat.description: Latitude of the location (-90 to 90). Required for get_current, get_forecast, get_hourly, get_historical.

lon.description: Longitude of the location (-180 to 180). Required for get_current, get_forecast, get_hourly, get_historical.

days.description: Number of forecast days (1-16). Optional for get_forecast, defaults to 7.

hours.description: Number of forecast hours (1-168). Optional for get_hourly, defaults to 24.

start_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Required for get_historical.

end_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Required for get_historical.

name.description: Location name to search for. Required for search_location. Max 200 characters.
